intro.title: What's your inner animal personality?
intro.line1: If you were an animal, what would you be?
intro.line2: Are you a bold adventurer, a calm observer, or someone who just wants to nap in the corner all day?
intro.line3: This fun quiz asks 10 quirky questions to explore your instincts ‚Äî and help uncover the little creature hiding inside you üêæ

q1.question: You walk into an elevator and see a duck in a suit nodding at you. What do you do?
q1.b: Take a photo‚Äîthis is too absurd!
q1.c: Ignore it. Nothing surprises me anymore in this city.

q2.question: You must commute for a year without walking. What do you choose?
q2.a: Ride a kangaroo‚Äîparkour style every day.
q2.b: Float in a balloon through the clouds.
q2.c: Use a random portal‚Äîsometimes it sends you to the wrong country.
q2.d: Drink a magical juice for hyper speed, but sweat like a fountain.

q3.question: A giant glowing mushroom suddenly grows in your yard. What do you do?
q3.a: Start a livestream‚Äîthis will blow up online!
q3.b: Examine it under a microscope. It could be a new energy source!
q3.c: Report it to the authorities... and secretly keep a piece.
q3.d: Nap underneath it and see if you have weird dreams.

q4.question: You're invited to a 'Try Not to Laugh' contest. Winner gets a million dollars. What‚Äôs your strategy?
q4.a: Meditate and enter a zen-like state.
q4.b: Analyze old contests and simulate comedy attacks.
q4.c: Wear a suit and stay stone-faced with sheer presence.
q4.d: Make others laugh while laughing yourself‚Äîsteal the spotlight.

q5.question: You receive an order from the future: 'This product will change humanity.' What will you design?
q5.a: An AI coat that gives warm hugs to anyone feeling lonely.
q5.b: A safety bubble that bounces you if you fall.
q5.c: Mind-reading earbuds that catch subconscious thoughts.
q5.d: An AI double that declines annoying invitations for you.

q6.question: You wake up as a cat. What do you do?
q6.a: Test if you really have nine lives.
q6.b: Observe humans and study their behavior.
q6.c: Ask everyone for cuddles and affection.
q6.d: Hide. No one must ever find out your secret.

q7.question: You win 100 million in the lottery. What‚Äôs your first purchase?
q7.a: Build an animal park so all creatures live happily.
q7.b: Invest in tech and make your money multiply.
q7.c: Buy a hidden mansion where no one can find you.
q7.d: Go abroad immediately for a never-ending vacation!

q8.question: You're in a strange contest: Most creative daydream wins. What's your style?
q8.a: Stare at a rock for 10 minutes, imagining its volcanic origin story.
q8.b: Hold an awkward balance pose like a statue.
q8.c: Stare blankly and recite philosophical questions in your head.
q8.d: Stare at the judges without blinking. Let them wonder what you're thinking.

q9.question: You get a magical button that can permanently change one everyday rule. What do you do?
q9.a: Everyone gets 8 hours of perfect sleep and wakes up refreshed.
q9.b: All desserts become healthy, no weight gain or cavities!
q9.c: Pets can clean up and take out the trash‚Äîhome MVPs!
q9.d: Everyone experiences something funny each day‚Äîbuilt-in joy!

q10.question: The world now has strange new rules‚Äîand you actually like them. Which one do you choose?
q10.a: Every day plays a 5-second background track only you can hear.
q10.b: Every room you enter has automatic mood lighting.
q10.c: Subtitles appear in your mind as you speak.
q10.d: All mirrors adjust your reflection based on your mood.

result.title: You're most like a {{animal}}!

tit.name: Long-tailed Tit
tit.personality: Like a Long-tailed Tit, you're enthusiastic, active, and a little clingy in a social way! You love doing things with others and always bring energy to the group ‚Äì you're the little sun of the team üåû.

wolf.name: Arctic Gray Wolf
wolf.personality: Like an Arctic Gray Wolf, you're calm and independent. You value freedom, dislike interference, and often dwell in deep thoughts. You move quietly but always strike with precision.

monkey.name: Owl Monkey
monkey.personality: You're like an Owl Monkey ‚Äì observant, quiet, and thoughtful. You love to think when the world is asleep, and you're known for your strong insight and thirst for knowledge.

fox.name: Fennec Fox
fox.personality: Lively and clever, you're like a Fennec Fox. Your curiosity drives you to explore the unknown, and you're quick to act and sharp in response.

dolphin.name: Bottlenose Dolphin
dolphin.personality: You're a Bottlenose Dolphin ‚Äì kind, smart, and full of love! Great at communication and teamwork, you're the cheerful heart of the group and a natural problem-solver üåä‚ú®.

result.download_info: Press and hold the image to save it to your device.
result.download_no_open_window: Unable to open a new window. Please check your browser settings.
